attributes.review: So this app took one month to download I have been waiting one month to open this app and it still asks for my number. I have waited too long this app is the worst if Donald Trump wants to raise up his campaign he best not be making me wait a month for this app to download
attributes.title: The worst app 🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮

attributes.review: I wanted to get this app to support my president and learn more about the news going on and it was a disaster from the start! Not only did this app take so long to download it kept crashing! I’m not buying this app ever again and not recommending it to anyone!
attributes.title: Don’t get this app

attributes.review: Right when I downloaded this app, it sent a text to every single one of the contacts on my phone telling them to vote for trump. I couldn’t believe it!! Everyone got mad at me, called me a racist, homophobic, transphobic, sexist, sex predator, rapist, incompetent person 😪 Now everyone HATES me. DONT download this app 😤
attributes.title: This app ruined my life 😭😩

attributes.review: Not only did the app take a whole month to download but when it was finally completed and I opened it a virus was put into my phone and I couldn’t open any other app without seeing inappropriate pictures of the president with Stormy Daniels
attributes.title: Gave me a virus

attributes.review: I Downloaded the app cuz I wanted to show more love to the big orange🍊 god but once I opened the app these bugs came out of no where and said delete this app or they will kill me and my family and friends and the big orange 🍊god came to my house and just stared and the bugs threatening me and was laughing 😔🍊❌
attributes.title: DONT GET THE APP UR LIFE IS IN DANGER

attributes.review: This was an awful app. I downloaded it to support our Cheeto president but it took weeks to download. Don’t bother it doesn’t work and once you open the app you only see a white screen nothing else. If I could give it zero stars I would.
attributes.title: Do not download

attributes.review: I downloaded this app to learn about our rotten arrange for a president but all it said was nonsense! There was no point in the app, it only made me go from half a brain cell to 0 😿😿 I miss my half a braincell. The app attracted horny rednecks that wouldn’t stop yeehawing, pls don’t download this app for your own safety‼️😾😿🙀😢🤬🤯🥵😱😥
attributes.title: Worst app in existence! 😿

attributes.review: whenever i use this app or even open it my phone gets really hot until it hurts to touch. my fingers are raw from holding my phone when it hasn’t cooled off. i once saw it smoking. DO NOT get this app it doesn’t have one good thing about it.
attributes.title: heats up my phone

attributes.review: This is 100% the worst app I have ever downloaded in my life, nothing works correctly and it too 4 days to download. Also this app just was horrible glitchy and should not even exist because it does not work and is a price of crap.
